info.name: Multi-Tenant Financial Risk API
info.description:
Complete API collection for testing all endpoints in the multi-tenant financial risk prediction system

## ðŸ“‹ Collection Structure:

### ðŸ” Authentication Endpoints
- **Public Endpoints**: Registration, Login, Organization Join, Token Refresh, Logout
- **Access Level**: Public (no authentication required)

### ðŸ” Admin Authentication Endpoints  
- **Admin Functions**: User Creation, Impersonation, Password Reset, Audit, Bulk Operations
- **Access Level**: Admin roles only (Super/Tenant/Org Admin)

### ðŸ¢ Tenant Endpoints
- **Tenant Management**: CRUD operations for tenants
- **Access Level**: Super Admin only

### ðŸ›ï¸ Organization Endpoints
- **Organization Management**: CRUD operations, user management, whitelist control
- **Access Level**: Role-based (Super/Tenant/Org Admin)

### ðŸ‘¥ User Endpoints
- **User Management**: Profile management, role updates, account lifecycle
- **Access Level**: Mixed (self-service + admin operations)

## ðŸ”‘ Authentication Flow:
1. Register or Login â†’ Get access_token
2. Use Bearer token in Authorization header
3. Role-based access control applies automatically

## ðŸ›¡ï¸ Role Hierarchy:
- **super_admin**: Full system access
- **tenant_admin**: Tenant-scoped management
- **org_admin**: Organization-scoped management  
- **member**: Organization member
- **user**: Basic user access

item.name: ðŸ” AUTHENTICATION ENDPOINTS
item.description: Public authentication endpoints - no authentication required

request.description:
**Purpose**: Self-registration for new users

**Access**: Public (no authentication required)

**Expected Response**: 201 Created

**Body Parameters**:
- `email` (string, required): Valid email address
- `password` (string, required): Strong password
- `first_name` (string, required): User's first name
- `last_name` (string, required): User's last name
- `organization_id` (string, optional): Organization to join (if applicable)

**Notes**: 
- Creates user with default role 'user'
- Password must meet security requirements
- Email must be unique

**Purpose**: Authenticate user and get JWT tokens

**Access**: Public (no authentication required)

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Body Parameters**:
- `email` (string, required): User's email
- `password` (string, required): User's password

**Response**:
- `access_token`: JWT token for API access
- `refresh_token`: Token for refreshing access token
- `token_type`: Always 'bearer'
- `user`: User information

**Notes**: 
- Save the access_token for subsequent requests
- Access token expires in 30 minutes
- Use refresh token to get new access token

**Purpose**: Register and automatically join an organization using invite token

**Access**: Public (no authentication required)

**Expected Response**: 201 Created

**Body Parameters**:
- `email` (string, required): Valid email address
- `password` (string, required): Strong password
- `first_name` (string, required): User's first name
- `last_name` (string, required): User's last name
- `join_token` (string, required): Organization invitation token

**Notes**: 
- Creates user and adds to organization in one step
- Join token must be valid and not expired
- Email may need to be on organization whitelist

**Purpose**: Get new access token using refresh token

**Access**: Public (no authentication required)

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Body Parameters**:
- `refresh_token` (string, required): Valid refresh token from login

**Response**:
- `access_token`: New JWT token for API access
- `token_type`: Always 'bearer'

**Notes**: 
- Use when access token expires
- Refresh token has longer expiry than access token
- Updates the access_token variable automatically

**Purpose**: Logout user and invalidate tokens

**Access**: Requires authentication (Bearer token)

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {access_token}

**Notes**: 
- Invalidates current session
- Client should clear stored tokens
- No body parameters required

item.name: ðŸ” ADMIN AUTHENTICATION ENDPOINTS
item.description: Admin-only authentication and management endpoints - Admin level access required

request.description:
**Purpose**: Create a new user with role assignment (Admin only)

**Access**: Super Admin, Tenant Admin, or Org Admin

**Expected Response**: 201 Created

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {admin_token}

**Body Parameters**:
- `email` (string, required): User's email address
- `password` (string, required): User's password
- `first_name` (string, required): User's first name
- `last_name` (string, required): User's last name
- `global_role` (string, optional): Global role (user, tenant_admin, super_admin)

**Notes**: 
- Admins can create users with appropriate roles
- Super admin can assign any role
- Tenant admin can assign user/tenant_admin roles
- Org admin can only assign user role

**Purpose**: Impersonate another user (Super Admin only)

**Access**: Super Admin only

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {super_admin_token}

**Path Parameters**:
- `user_id` (UUID, required): User ID to impersonate

**Response**:
- `access_token`: JWT token for impersonated user
- `token_type`: Bearer
- `expires_in`: 30 minutes (shorter for security)
- `impersonating`: Email of impersonated user
- `impersonated_by`: Email of admin

**Notes**: 
- âš ï¸ **POWERFUL FEATURE** - Use with caution
- Only super admins can impersonate
- Shorter token expiry for security
- All actions logged for audit trail

**Purpose**: Force password reset for a user (Admin only)

**Access**: Super Admin, Tenant Admin, or Org Admin (scope-based)

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {admin_token}

**Path Parameters**:
- `user_id` (UUID, required): User ID to reset password

**Query Parameters**:
- `new_password` (string, required): New password (min 8 chars)

**Notes**: 
- Admins can reset passwords for users they manage
- Super admin can reset any password
- Tenant admin can reset passwords in their tenant
- Org admin can reset passwords in their organization
- Password must meet security requirements

**Purpose**: Get login history and audit information for a user

**Access**: Super Admin, Tenant Admin, or Org Admin (scope-based)

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {admin_token}

**Path Parameters**:
- `user_id` (UUID, required): User ID to get history

**Response**:
- `user_id`: User's ID
- `email`: User's email
- `last_login`: Last login timestamp
- `created_at`: Account creation date
- `is_active`: Account status
- `organization_id`: Organization membership

**Notes**: 
- Useful for user activity monitoring
- Scope-based access control
- Returns audit-relevant information

**Purpose**: Bulk activate multiple users at once (Admin only)

**Access**: Super Admin, Tenant Admin, or Org Admin (scope-based)

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {admin_token}

**Body Parameters**:
- `user_ids` (array, required): Array of user IDs to activate (max 100)

**Response**:
- `message`: Summary of operation
- `activated_users`: Array of successfully activated users
- `failed_users`: Array of failed activations with reasons
- `processed_by`: Admin who performed the operation

**Notes**: 
- Maximum 100 users per request
- Scope-based permissions apply
- Returns detailed success/failure report
- Useful for batch user management

item.name: ðŸ¢ TENANTS ENDPOINTS
item.description: Tenant management - Super Admin access only

request.description:
**Purpose**: Create a new tenant organization

**Access**: Super Admin only

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {super_admin_token}

**Body Parameters**:
- `name` (string, required): Tenant organization name
- `description` (string, optional): Description of the tenant
- `domain` (string, optional): Primary domain for the tenant

**Notes**: 
- Only super admins can create tenants
- Tenant name must be unique
- Returns created tenant with generated ID

**Purpose**: Get list of all tenants in the system

**Access**: Super Admin only

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {super_admin_token}

**Query Parameters**: None

**Response**: Array of tenant objects

**Notes**: 
- Only super admins can view all tenants
- Returns complete tenant information
- Useful for tenant management overview

**Purpose**: Get detailed information about a specific tenant

**Access**: Super Admin only

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {super_admin_token}

**Path Parameters**:
- `tenant_id` (UUID, required): ID of the tenant to retrieve

**Notes**: 
- Returns detailed tenant information
- 404 if tenant not found
- Only super admins can access any tenant details

**Purpose**: Update tenant information

**Access**: Super Admin only

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {super_admin_token}

**Path Parameters**:
- `tenant_id` (UUID, required): ID of the tenant to update

**Body Parameters**:
- `name` (string, optional): New tenant name
- `description` (string, optional): New description
- `domain` (string, optional): New primary domain

**Notes**: 
- Only super admins can update tenants
- Partial updates supported
- Returns updated tenant information

**Purpose**: Delete a tenant and all associated data

**Access**: Super Admin only

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {super_admin_token}

**Path Parameters**:
- `tenant_id` (UUID, required): ID of the tenant to delete

**Notes**: 
- âš ï¸ **DESTRUCTIVE OPERATION** - Deletes all tenant data
- Only super admins can delete tenants
- Cascades to organizations, users, and predictions
- Use with extreme caution

**Purpose**: Get statistical information about a tenant

**Access**: Super Admin only

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {super_admin_token}

**Path Parameters**:
- `tenant_id` (UUID, required): ID of the tenant

**Response**: Statistical data including:
- Number of organizations
- Number of users
- Number of predictions
- Usage metrics

**Notes**: 
- Useful for tenant analytics
- Performance metrics included
- Only super admins can access tenant stats

item.name: ðŸ›ï¸ ORGANIZATIONS ENDPOINTS
item.description: Organization management - Admin level access required

request.description:
**Purpose**: Create a new organization within a tenant

**Access**: Super Admin, Tenant Admin, or Org Admin

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {admin_token}

**Body Parameters**:
- `name` (string, required): Organization name
- `description` (string, optional): Organization description
- `tenant_id` (UUID, required): Parent tenant ID

**Notes**: 
- Creates organization within specified tenant
- Generates unique join token for invitations
- Returns created organization with join token

**Purpose**: Get list of organizations based on user role

**Access**: Role-based access control
- Super Admin: All organizations
- Tenant Admin: Organizations in their tenant
- Org Admin: Organizations they manage
- User: Organizations they belong to

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {token}

**Query Parameters**: None

**Notes**: 
- Results filtered by user permissions
- Returns organization summaries
- Includes user's role in each organization

**Purpose**: Get detailed information about a specific organization

**Access**: Users with access to the organization

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {token}

**Path Parameters**:
- `org_id` (UUID, required): Organization ID

**Notes**: 
- Returns detailed organization information
- Includes join token for admins
- 403 if user doesn't have access
- 404 if organization not found

**Purpose**: Update organization information

**Access**: Organization admins only

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {admin_token}

**Path Parameters**:
- `org_id` (UUID, required): Organization ID to update

**Body Parameters**:
- `name` (string, optional): New organization name
- `description` (string, optional): New description

**Notes**: 
- Only org admins can update organization
- Partial updates supported
- Returns updated organization information

**Purpose**: Delete an organization and all associated data

**Access**: Super Admin or Tenant Admin only

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {admin_token}

**Path Parameters**:
- `org_id` (UUID, required): Organization ID to delete

**Notes**: 
- âš ï¸ **DESTRUCTIVE OPERATION** - Deletes all organization data
- Removes all users from organization
- Deletes all associated predictions
- Only super/tenant admins can delete organizations

**Purpose**: Generate a new join token for organization invitations

**Access**: Organization admins only

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {admin_token}

**Path Parameters**:
- `org_id` (UUID, required): Organization ID

**Response**:
- `join_token`: New invitation token
- `expires_at`: Token expiration time

**Notes**: 
- Invalidates previous join token
- Use for sending organization invitations
- Token has limited validity period

**Purpose**: Get list of users in the organization

**Access**: Organization members and admins

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {token}

**Path Parameters**:
- `org_id` (UUID, required): Organization ID

**Response**: Array of user objects with roles

**Notes**: 
- Shows all users in the organization
- Includes user roles and status
- Filtered based on viewer permissions

**Purpose**: Add an email to organization whitelist for join access

**Access**: Organization admins only

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {admin_token}

**Path Parameters**:
- `org_id` (UUID, required): Organization ID

**Body Parameters**:
- `email` (string, required): Email address to whitelist

**Notes**: 
- Allows email to join organization via token
- Email validation performed
- Prevents duplicate entries

**Purpose**: Get list of whitelisted emails for the organization

**Access**: Organization admins only

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {admin_token}

**Path Parameters**:
- `org_id` (UUID, required): Organization ID

**Response**: Array of whitelisted email addresses

**Notes**: 
- Shows all emails allowed to join organization
- Admin-only access for privacy
- Useful for managing organization access

**Purpose**: Remove an email from organization whitelist

**Access**: Organization admins only

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {admin_token}

**Path Parameters**:
- `org_id` (UUID, required): Organization ID
- `email` (string, required): Email address to remove

**Notes**: 
- Removes email from join whitelist
- Email will no longer be able to join via token
- 404 if email not in whitelist

item.name: ðŸ‘¥ USERS ENDPOINTS
item.description: User management - Admin level access for CRUD operations

request.description:
**Purpose**: Create a new user (Admin operation)

**Access**: Admins only (Super/Tenant/Org Admin)

**Expected Response**: 201 Created

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {admin_token}

**Body Parameters**:
- `email` (string, required): User's email address
- `password` (string, required): User's password
- `first_name` (string, required): User's first name
- `last_name` (string, required): User's last name
- `role` (string, optional): User role (default: 'user')
- `organization_id` (UUID, optional): Organization assignment
- `tenant_id` (UUID, optional): Tenant assignment

**Notes**: 
- Different from public registration
- Allows setting initial role and assignments
- Admin-controlled user creation

**Purpose**: Get list of users based on role-based access

**Access**: Role-based filtering
- Super Admin: All users
- Tenant Admin: Users in their tenant
- Org Admin: Users in their organizations

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {token}

**Query Parameters**: None (filtering automatic)

**Notes**: 
- Results filtered by user permissions
- Returns user summaries (no sensitive data)
- Includes role and organization info

**Purpose**: Get detailed information about a specific user

**Access**: Permission-based access
- Admins: Users they manage
- Users: Their own profile only

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {token}

**Path Parameters**:
- `user_id` (UUID, required): User ID to retrieve

**Notes**: 
- Returns detailed user information
- 403 if insufficient permissions
- 404 if user not found

**Purpose**: Update user information (Admin or self)

**Access**: 
- Admins: Users they manage
- Users: Their own profile only

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {token}

**Path Parameters**:
- `user_id` (UUID, required): User ID to update

**Body Parameters**:
- `first_name` (string, optional): New first name
- `last_name` (string, optional): New last name
- `email` (string, optional): New email address

**Notes**: 
- Partial updates supported
- Email uniqueness validated
- Self-update or admin permissions required

**Purpose**: Delete a user account

**Access**: Admins only

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {admin_token}

**Path Parameters**:
- `user_id` (UUID, required): User ID to delete

**Notes**: 
- âš ï¸ **DESTRUCTIVE OPERATION** - Deletes user account
- Admin permissions required
- Cannot delete own account
- Removes user from all organizations

**Purpose**: Activate a user account

**Access**: Admins only

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {admin_token}

**Path Parameters**:
- `user_id` (UUID, required): User ID to activate

**Notes**: 
- Enables user account for login
- Admin permissions required
- User can access system after activation

**Purpose**: Deactivate a user account

**Access**: Admins only

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {admin_token}

**Path Parameters**:
- `user_id` (UUID, required): User ID to deactivate

**Notes**: 
- Disables user account login
- Admin permissions required
- User cannot access system when deactivated
- Reversible with activate endpoint

**Purpose**: Update a user's role

**Access**: Admins only (higher role required)

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {admin_token}

**Path Parameters**:
- `user_id` (UUID, required): User ID to update role

**Body Parameters**:
- `role` (string, required): New role (user, org_admin, tenant_admin, super_admin)

**Notes**: 
- Can only assign roles equal or lower than your own
- Super admin can assign any role
- Role hierarchy: super_admin > tenant_admin > org_admin > user

**Purpose**: Get current user's profile information

**Access**: Any authenticated user (self)

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {token}

**Response**: Current user's profile data

**Notes**: 
- Returns own profile information
- Includes role and organization details
- Safe endpoint for profile views

**Purpose**: Update current user's own profile

**Access**: Any authenticated user (self)

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {token}

**Body Parameters**:
- `first_name` (string, optional): New first name
- `last_name` (string, optional): New last name
- `email` (string, optional): New email address

**Notes**: 
- Users can update their own profile
- Partial updates supported
- Email uniqueness validated
- Cannot change role or organization assignments

**Purpose**: Alternative endpoint to get current user information

**Access**: Any authenticated user (self)

**Expected Response**: 200 OK

**Headers**:
- `Authorization`: Bearer {token}

**Response**: Current user's information

**Notes**: 
- Identical to /profile endpoint
- Alternative naming convention
- Moved from auth module to users module
- Returns same data as /profile
